headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid POOL and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, Pool’s shares (currently trading at $300.73) have posted a disappointing 14% loss while the S&P 500 was flat. This was partly driven by its softer quarterly results and may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
